footer.text: Character Guide â€¢ Build: Ineffa | Update Date: 08/09/2025 | Editor: .m1zuneko

fields.name: Best Weapon(s):
fields.value:
__Fractured Halo__ - signature and best weapon for Ineffa's personal damage as well as teamwide Lunar-Charged DMG buff.
__Staff if the Scarlet Sands__ - provides Ineffa with needed stats like CRIT Rate and bonus ATK.
__Deathmatch__ and __Ballad of the Fjords__ - equally good BP weapons for Ineffa
__Missive Windspear__ and __Tamayuratei no Ohanashi__ - event polearms that give Ineffa stats she needs.
__Kitain Cross Spear__ - one of the best F2P polearms that also helps with Ineffa's ER requirements.
__Favonius Lance__ - can be a good pick if Ineffa or her teammates need extra energy, at the cost of Ineffa's personal damage.

fields.name: Main Stats Priority
fields.value: <sands> ATK%|<goblet> ATK%|<circlet> CRIT Rate or CRIT DMG

fields.name: Talent Priority
fields.value:
**1)** E. Cleaning Mode: Carrier Frequency
**2)** Q. Supreme Instruction: Cyclonic Exterminator
**3)** Normal Attack: Cyclonic Duster

fields.name: Notes:
fields.value: Ineffa has a stat goal of 2000 ATK in order to maximize Lunar-Charged DMG bonus she provides her team with through her ascension passive, Moonsign Benediction: Assemblage Hub
